ComicInfo.Summary:
Andromeda and Lucien battle Voivodul, the evil Dayak sorcerer-god.
Lucien breaks through the very first part of this story, beating back the forces which is before him. Andromeda accompanies him and watches as he slashes and rips through flesh. It is a very short story giving some information on what is in store for the story arc.
Cover Price: Free
Format: Color; Standard Comic Issue; 16 pages
